{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Mi-Router-AX1800.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX1800 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://ru.c.mi.com/thread-1942583-1-0.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Xiaomi_Mi_Router_Redmi_AX5_(AX1800) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Xiaomi |model = Mi Router Redmi |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = AX5 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/09/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Xiaomi_Mi_Router_AX1800 |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = DVB4252CN <!-- DVB4258GL --> |fcc_id = 2AIMR |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = RA67 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ6000; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz 1.2 GHz (+ 1x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59D1G81MB-45TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15T2G16128A-DEB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 5C:53:C3 |oui = 5C:53:C3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.14;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, DBDC, OFDMA, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4200;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4550;;2;,,, PMIC;MPS<!--(Monolithic Power Systems)-->;MP5496;MPSM18, MP5496, 24G694;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.31.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Xiaomi_XXXX,Xiaomi_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5022; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5052; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices}}
*[https://4pda.to/forum/index.php?showtopic=995699 ''Xiaomi Redmi AX5 AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Mesh Router'' on '''4pda''' forums] :• [[Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX5 (AX1800)]] - WiFi 6 Router (DVB4252CN) :• [[Xiaomi Mi AX1800]] - AIoT WiFi 6 Router Global Edition (DVB4258GL) : PCB ID: RA67 (DVB4252CN/DVB4258GL)
===Specifications=== *[https://github.com/Lvellios/OpenWrt-AX5-AX1800 ''OpenWrt Redmi AX5 (AX1800)'' on '''GitHub'''] :;[[Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX5 (AX1800)]] (DVB4252CN) :• CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6000 - Quad Core (ARM Cortex-A53) @1.2GHz, NPU: @1.5GHz :• Flash: 128MB - GigaDevice GD9FS1G8F2A (9FS1G8F2AMGI, UAQ229, SLC, TSOP48) :• RAM: 256MB - ESMT M15T2G16128A (AZL1-P99W015S-DEB001, DDR3, FBGA96) :• WLAN: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5022/QPF4200 (2.4GHz) / QCN5052/QPF4550 (5GHz) :• Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8075 (1x 1GbE WAN, 3x 1GbE LAN ports) :• Power Management IC: MPS<!--(Monolithic Power Systems)--> MP5496 (MPSM18, MP5496, 24G694)
:;[[Xiaomi Mi AX1800]] (DVB4258GL) :• Flash: 128MB - ESMT F59D1G81MB (F59D1G81MB, AZM1P991K-4577-2003, TSOP48) :• RAM: 256MB - ESMT M15T2G16128A (AZL1-P998K01S-DEB950, DDR3, FBGA96)
:;[[GL.iNet GL-AX1800]] (Flint) :• Flash: 128MB :• RAM: 512MB (DDR3L)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://kknews.cc/digital/e549k3n.html ''Xiaomi Mi Redmi AX5 (AX1800)'' on '''KKnews'''] (CN) *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/05/18/most-affordable-wifi-6-router-60-xiaomi-router-ax1800/ ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX1800'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://m.mydrivers.com/newsview/688865.html ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX1800'' on '''MyDrivers'''] *[https://post.smzdm.com/p/apz3m987/ ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX1800'' on '''Smzdm'''] *[https://www.androidpimp.com/wireless-routers/xiaomi-ax1800-wifi-6-router-review/ ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX1800'' on '''AndroidPIMP''']

*[[Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX5 (AX1800)]] (RA67) • [https://kknews.cc/digital/e549k3n.html Review] (CN) *[[Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX6 (AX3000)]] (RB01) • [https://www.acwifi.net/11176.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) *[[Xiaomi Mi Router AC1200 (RB02)]] (AC1200) • (RB02) *[[Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX6S (AX3200)]] (RB03) • [https://www.acwifi.net/16612.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) *[[Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX6E (AX6000)]] (RB06) • [https://www.acwifi.net/19676.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN)
